title.rendered: STEDI LED / DRL FOG LIGHT TO SUIT IRONMAN BULL BARS

content.rendered:
STEDI LED & DRL Fog Light upgrade to suit both past and present Ironman bull bars.

STEDI LED FOG & DRL UPGRADE

STEDI’s LED fog light with built-in DRL is designed to suit Ironman 4×4 & some MCC & Dobinson Bull bars. Fits 100% of all Ironman bull bars that come included with standard fog light. We’ve made the upgrade a true DIY. The LED fog beam is designed to plug into the existing connectors for the stock fog lights and each assembly includes all necessary connectors, rubber seals, and pigtails for a plug n play install.

INTELLIGENT DAYTIME-RUNNING-LIGHT (DRL)

STEDI’s LED & DRL retrofit kit comes included with an intelligent DRL control module that makes activating and deactivating a breeze. When the vehicle’s headlights are on you can either select for the DRL dim down to 50% brightness or turn off entirely.

NOT JUST A PRETTY FACE.

The high performance LED in the STEDI FOG & DRL upgrade not only substantially increase brightness, but the projector based optics perfectly distributes that brightness for a clean ultra-wide beam.

DETAILS

Compatible with all of the following Ironman 4×4 Bull Bars:

  • Aluminium
  • Deluxe Commercial
  • Protector
  • Premium Deluxe
  • No Loop / Single Loop Bull Bars

Also fits some Dobinson bull bars with 110mm diameter fog light.

STEDI Designed & Manufactured: This product is not endorsed by, directly affiliated with MCC, Dobinson or Ironman. All product and company names are the registered trademarks of their original owners. The use of any trade name or trademark is for compatibility and reference purposes only and does not imply any association with the trademark holder of their product brand.

SPECIFICATIONS

HOUSING MATERIAL Alloy
LED Luxeon T LED
COMPATIBLE VOLTAGE 12V
LIFESPAN 50,000hours
CONNECTOR TYPE Sealed
CERTIFICATION IP67
DRL DRAW 0.3a @ 13.6v / DIM 0.15a @ 13.6v
FOG LIGHT DRAW 0.8a @ 13.6v
COMPATIBLE  All Ironman bullbars. Some Dobinson Bull Bars

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 2 x STEDI LED Fog Light Upgrade to Suit Ironman Bull bars | BLACK
  • Waterproof Connectors
  • Full Wiring Harness
  • DRL Control Module.
  • Zip Ties
  • Installation Instructions

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
